nodes.text: Pletik soup was a type of soup that was boiled. In 19 BBY, on the planet Coruscant, Laranth Tarak, a Gray Paladin, told the Jedi Knight, Jax Pavan, that the Force was boiling around him like Pletik soup before he asked Tarak to help him find 10-4TO, a droid that Pavan's dead Master, Even Piell, tasked him with locating.

Pletik soup was first mentioned in Coruscant Nights I: Jedi Twilight, a 2008 novel written by Michael Reaves. On March 11, 2011, "Citadel Rescue," an episode of Star Wars: The Clone Wars, retconned Even Piell's death to occur in the episode, instead of the novel, making it ambiguous how the events of the novel fit in with the altered continuity.
